A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is not Star Wars.  I was apprehensive\, yet hopeful when Disney bought Star Wars.  I was concerned about how they would handle Luke's character.  My greatest fear came true.  The Last Jedi managed to not only destroy Luke's character\, but it also managed to destroy the Star Wars saga and its future.  I will continue to enjoy the original trilogy\, but will never again watch a Disney Star Wars film or buy their products.
